scripts.deploy: eb use udagram-api&& eb deploy udagram-api
scripts.build: npm install && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config&& cp .npmrc www/.npmrc&& cp package.json www/package.json && zip -r www/Archive.zip www/
scripts.build00: npm install && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config&& cp .npmrc www/.npmrc&& cp package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.set:env: eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST="database-1.cbmigqbnjgzj.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com" DB_PORT="5432" POSTGRES_USERNAME="postgres" POSTGRES_PASSWORD="321456Sa" POSTGRES_DB="postgres"

scripts.build0: npm install -f && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config&& cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk&& cp .npmrc www/.npmrc&& cp package.json www/package.json
scripts.deploy0: npm run build && echo "before init" &&eb init udagram-api --region us-east-1 --platform node.js && echo "after init" &&eb list &&eb use udagram-api&& echo "after use" && eb deploy udagram-api

scripts.build2: copy /y .elasticbeanstalk\* www\ && copy /y src\config\* www\config && copy /y .npmrc www\.npmrc && copy /y package.json www\package.json && cd www && 7z a -tzip Archive.zip . && cd ..
